question: Process index?

options.details: Creates a covering index, drops the old one, creates the final index, and removes the covering index

options.description: Skip this index and continue to the next one
options.details: Leaves this index as-is and proceeds to the next index in the collection

context: This prompt appears when you selected 'specify' mode for indexes. The Cover-Swap-Cleanup process takes 6 steps per index.
